title: Motilal Oswal picks Muthoot Finance as top bet from NBFC space, sees up to 26% upside - Moneycontrol
content: Motilal Oswal picks Muthoot Finance as top bet from NBFC space, sees up to 26% upside  Moneycontrol
description: Muthoot Finance has a strong brand and well-entrenched distribution that will help it gain incremental share in the expanded market pie for gold loans, Motilal Oswal said.
